TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit _RemotableHandle extends System.ValueType

summary.span: L'oggetto e tutti i relativi membri esposti fanno parte di un wrapper gestito per l'interfaccia di accessibilità COM (Component Object Model).

span.span: The and all of its exposed members are part of a managed wrapper for the Component Object Model (COM) accessibility interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Per ulteriori informazioni , vedere la [Microsoft Active Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd373592(v=vs.85).aspx) documentazione.For more information about , see the [Microsoft Active Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd373592(v=vs.85).aspx) documentation.
